title: Into the Wildcards
description:
Mina and Mike Golic, Jr. review the standings of the team draft they did before the season, preview and pick all six wild card weekend games, discuss the best head coach opening, and select the retired player they'd most want to insert into a game this weekend.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
